name: pnp-sync-splib-into-az-storage-container
title: Sync SharePoint Document Library Documents with Azure Storage Container
shortDescription: This script shows how to download and sync documents in a SharePoint Document Library into an Azure Storage Container.
longDescription: This PowerShell script shows how to download and sync documents in a SharePoint Document Library into an Azure Storage Container using CLI for Microsoft 365 and Azure CLI commands.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
